name: Legends of the Mushroom Needle
description:
A roguelike stealth game.

      As the mushroom needle you must save your people from the commander, who has brainwashed them in order to expand their army. Control enemies movements by turning lanterns on and off, find journals that contain the information on which enemies have been brainwashed, and lure the enemies away from each other or together before shooting them with your bow.

When one dies the next is born....
